title: Skinny Serif Block

comments.content:
Looks like [Nyala](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701123248/http:/www.fonts.com/font/microsoft-corporation/nyala)

I believe it comes standard with MS Office these days
Thanks! It looked familiar but I couldn't place it, well done.
